mapper.select:
SELECT B.BOARD_SNO, B.TITLE, C.CSTMR_NM, B.REG_DATE, B.VIEWS, B.CTGR_DIV_CD FROM BOARD B, CSTMR C WHERE B.CSTMR_SNO = C.CSTMR_SNO AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND B.CTGR_DIV_CD = #{ctgrDivCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENT, CSTMR_SNO, CTGR_DIV_CD ) VALUE ( #{title}, #{content}, #{cstmrSno}, #{ctgrDivCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_SNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CSTMR_SNO, C.CSTMR_NM, B.REG_DATE, B.CTGR_DIV_CD, B.VIEWS FROM BOARD B, CSTMR C WHERE B.CSTMR_SNO = C.CSTMR_SNO AND B.BOARD_SNO = #{boardSno}
